body: I remember having problems with Legend Parameters as well, it was freezing my laptop before so I was avoiding any legend tweaks with Sky Dome. I just checked it and as Mostapha said, with latest version (.62) it works good and faster (or maybe it only felt so to me). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EqXI2*bZ158SDBPbrW4jkiCp**XEKKfJYKA-9pCQ6anpBRYHUIEoeKreTmwkRDQFkofPxiupu4*tH1P8DlNr3r3sNqFC2SeL/Capture.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EqXI2*bZ15-Lg1JhFA0F0FxiibYB9Ve9BMVd8a1FMmYfS9wbpSBWzR9ydZypy89b2wR9d-f0kQwepXbudErGVMFJtWN5LXbp/Capture1.PNG) Great to know that, thanks for the fix Mostapha!
